label: start-game
text: Based on Football Grid. You have a 3x3 grid with countries at the top and clubs on the columns. You can play with Champions League or Copa Libertadores players
title: About the game

label: one-player
text: You have to fill the grid with players who are <u>currently</u> playing in the team on the left and are from the country above in the shortest possible time.
title: The goal

label: restart
text: You can restart the grid whenever you want, the teams and countries will be restarted and the play will start again
title: Restart the game

label: see-team
text: You can check which player could be a good match by clicking the team shield (redirect to transfermarkt web)
title: Help
